name: 黃慧禎
objective:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以語言和文學為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
This course that uses the national language to enrich the literary and artistic works, enrich the cultural connotation, and enhance the thinking ability and humanistic quality.
The course is divided into 2 credits for the first semester and 2 credits for the next semester. The content of the first semester of the freshman year is based on the language and literatures . It is hoped that  will expand the students' ability to deeply appreciate the taste of literature, exercise flexible language sensitivity, tacitly understand literary creativity, and even try to create. The content of the lectures in the next semester is based on the ideological and famous articles. I hope to inspire students to analyze the ideas of various theories, to walk through the universe of the philosophers, to follow the journey of the philosophers, and then to read and understand. Take advantage of the inexhaustible a priori and demeanor.
